    Utilities related to keys

    Provides some utilities for keys manipulations

    • Method Detail

      • getKey

        public static java.lang.Long getKey(java.lang.String Ken,
                    java.lang.Integer Nbk)
                             throws AWException
        Reserve a number of unique keys for a given key name and returns the first key. It calls to a C web service, called "ALUwbsKeyGet", to reserve the keys.
        Parameters:
        Ken - Key name (usually "Tab.Cln")
        Nbk - Number of keys
        Returns:
        First generated key
        Throws:
        AWException
        See Also:
        ALUwbsKeyGet
